divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching what looked like a airplane but it had no flickering light,it got BRILANT WHITE and very bright looked like a dark hole in center then just vanished..never seen anyhting like that before!!any idea what it could have been??? it was so bright that it got the attention of a friend sitting on my steps with his back to it. did any stars explode tonight?
